alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Heard; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Carroll, Heard and northwestern Troup Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Ranburne to Tyus to near Plant Wansley, and moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Ephesus, Centralhatchee, Roopville, Waresville, Frolona, Texas, Plant Wansley, Tyus, Glenn, Blackjack Mountain and Roosterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
